message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable asset. I believe it's worth considering a price of $1800000, which is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1600000. This is a fair compromise that I believe you'll find reasonable.

I appreciate the willingness to meet halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can you consider this offer?
